#summary regimun installation instructions

= RegiMUN Installation =
Check out the source from SVN (see the Source tab) or download the tarball (see the Downloads tab).
 # Copy the source to somewhere that is PHP-enabled for your web server.
 # Edit config.php to your liking.
 # Create the data and backup directories (set in config.php) and chmod 777 them.
 # Edit the CSS files to your liking.
